In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
From Qorra b. Šarîk t[o]
Basil, administrator of Išqauh.
I praise God, be-
sides [whom] there is no god.
As to the matter in hand: men of the military force Leute von den Truppen haben mir
mentioned to me a (certain) registration (kitba) practised [b]y their villages über eine kitba in ihrer Ortschaft berichtet,
in deren Genuss sie seit vierzig on their behalf constantly for the past for-
Jahren stünden, und es [kommt ihnen nicht zu] ty years, though we did not find (?)
any of such documents. Therefore I cannot tell irgend etwas von den kitba's, und ich weiss nicht, was
.... dies von .... the truth of this from the false.
Drum wenn dieser mein Brief zu dir kommt, Now when [this] my letter comes to thee
so begib dich nach allen Ortschaften deines Kreises thou shouldest not [come] to any village of thy dis[trict]
und frage ihre Bewohner, without asking its people
about what there may be of this was sich in ihrer Ortschaft von dieser
kitba befindet und wem sie gehört. Wenn du dann weisst, registration (kitba) in their village, and in whose favour it is. And when thou knowest
was sich davon in jeder Ortschaft befindet, so gebe what there is thereof in each village, submit
den Befund jeder Ortschaft einem to me a report of what thee hast fou[nd]
Schreiber zu Protokoll. thereof in each village,
and thou shalt write for each man such a certificate as he has applied for
[to] me. And Wa[lîd (?)] wrote (it) [in]
the month of Rabîʿ I of the y[ea]r
ninety.
